__e: So, the question we asked ourselves is... ..how would it be if things didn't have to be the way we know they actually are, yes?
And if I had, well, then your mother and I might never have met.
If our timing had been different or if we hadn't met through you or if I had been an entirely different person, maybe...
No, because if we did, I wouldn't feel like I do right now.
It's not like we've never done it.
We're going to go out there and act like we didn't do anything wrong, which we didn't, kind of.
I sometimes think if we hadn't ended up in the same dorm I would have just met someone else.
I feel like we've come very far, from our usual world
You see, I just feel that if we had not gone away, none of this would have ever happened.
I am sorry. If we'd known what was gonna...
Of course, had we known your client was in the car...
I guess I just wish that we had known this was our fate,
Perhaps it would have gone differently, if we had heard from you.
Yeah, well, that would have been a little easier had we known who they were after.
Well, it's a good job I have otherwise we wouldn't have known.
But, if it hadn't been for you and your father, we wouldn't have had the chance to play.
The truth is, if it wasn't for your expertise, I don't think we would've caught this guy as soon as we did.
And because of that, there was nothing that either one of us could have done.
Otherwise we'd have to give up this place.
We would have had to go on meeting in secret and a killer would still be walking free.
If he wouldnt have come, we would have waited forever.
I didn't mean to hurt you
Yeah, because then i can say things like "if only we had more time," and all that.
Well, I can't pretend that we never had a kid.
